question.content: 预测未来5年黄石公园森林的增长情况，包括人类活动的影响。

function.name: forest_growth_forecast
function.description: Predicts the forest growth over the next N years based on current trends.

location.description: The location where you want to predict forest growth.

years.description: The number of years for the forecast.

include_human_impact.description: Whether or not to include the impact of human activities in the forecast. If not provided, defaults to false.

function.name: db_fetch_records
function.description: Fetch records from a specified database table based on certain conditions.

table_name.description: The name of the table from which records need to be fetched.

department.description: The name of the department of students.

school.description: The name of the school students are enrolled in.

conditions.description: The conditions based on which records are to be fetched.

fetch_limit.description: Limits the number of records to be fetched. If left empty, it fetches all records. (Optional) Default is 0.
